name: Fat Man Sam
overview: Fat Man Sam is a platform game published by Firebird for the BBC Microcomputer. Guide Sam around the forty screens, avoiding almost everything that moves. In order to exit each screen, Sam will need to collect all the objects that appear, sometimes keys, sometimes sweets, sometimes... who knows? And watch out for that crusher. You can only exit a screen when all the objects have been collected and the exit is flashing.
